abstract: On tour for their fourth album, the Arctic Monkeys are a more mature band.  But still only in their 20s, there is only so much grown-up stuff these lads from Britain can stomach.
snippet: On tour for their fourth album, the Arctic Monkeys are a more mature band.  But still only in their 20s, there is only so much grown-up stuff these lads from Britain can stomach.

headline.main: The Arctic Monkeys Grow Up, a Bit
